name: Cable Guy
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 46 Compo with theme "keep it alive".

In the game you play as a newly appointed server admin for fictional LD Jam and try to keep the website alive under extreme stress caused by the happy jammers.

Gameplay tricks
Gameplay is explained in tutorial level, but here are some tricks:

  • When attaching an cable to 2nd server, you should immediately attach a new cable to that server and try to connect it to the 3rd server (So that the connections go SERVER 1 -> SERVER 2 -> SERVER 3)

Known issues

  • Level 5 starting banner shows incorrectly "Level 1", when it's obviously not
